source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures an outdoor scene at the edge of a calm body of water with greenish, reflective water. A bank covered in dense green grass and some taller, drier reeds runs along the water's edge. A white egret with a long yellow beak is positioned amongst the grass on the bank. Initially, the bird is crouched low, looking down towards the water. It then makes a quick upward movement before settling back into a standing posture on the grassy bank. The scene occurs during daylight hours.
